1417510.name: PERFECT MATTER Soundtrack
1417510.description:
Experience the phenomenal sound of PERFECT MATTER; a compilation of some of Sunlight Defect's greatest work, brought together to set the tone and energy of this energetic Twin Stick Shooter.

The sound track consists of many styles and genres. Most prominently it features: Metal, Electronic, Score, and Rave.

Sunlight Defect's music is characterised by power, energy, and complexity. The perfect vibes for your epic conquest across a dying universe.
